recipesJson.name: LOOMA! by u/christopherson
recipesJson.author: ghweiss
recipesJson.description:
Juicy, well-rounded berry mix - reminiscent of Gatorade (in a good way).
Full notes at https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/3f4xmc/lets_make_looma_a_simple_recipe_that_well_dive/

reviews.text: It's very odd. Harvest Berry and Forest Fruit don't fit together very well in my palate. This also didn't taste anything like Gatorade.

Fantasticly well balanced recipe. If berries are your jam, this is without doubt worth a mix. I added 1% of ws23 to it and its been my adv for a couple weeks now. Delicious, vibrant well crafted combination of fruits. Thank you.
One of the recipes I keep coming back to. It's like a berry gatorade; really satisfying as a fruit flavour lover.
It's got some punch, in a good way....not over-flavored, but all the flavors are right in your face.
I'll be mixing up a lot more of this. Great recipe ghweiss!
One of my all time favorite recipes. It makes your teeth squeak. Also very enjoyable without the cactus,
